metadata.title: CVE-2015-7827 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Botan before 1.10.13 and 1.11.x before 1.11.22 make it easier for remoteattackers to conduct million-message attacks by measuring time differences,related to decoding of PKCS#1 padding.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-7827` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libbotan-1.10-0 - 1.10.5-1+deb7u1ubuntu0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: botan1.10 package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.10.5-1+deb7u1ubuntu0.14.04.1').
